system.description:
At 8th level your reputation as a lancer has reached its pinnacle but your reputation can only grow from here. You gain a +1 bonus to your renown, 2 additional exertion, and you may choose one of the following options.

  • Adept Lancer: Weapons which qualify for one with the spear become adept weapons in your hands. 

  • Fighter Lancer: You immediately learn a new school and maneuver of your choice, neither of which count against your limit of maneuvers or schools known.
